It is said that “Education can Change the World”. What according to you are the key contributions of Education in Modern Society?
Yes, In one hand education can change the world. As you can see the difference between the past and present position of our country. An educated individual will have a knowledge to do the things in a right way. Now-a-days everyone giving importance to education to be  successful or to succeed in life. Even in country side also people are giving much importance to the education. It helps to overcome some issues like invention of new drugs by researching to cure decease etc for the betterment of mankind. An educated individual will have a knowledge, which can turn the things topsy turvy, as knowledge is power. And as far as the contributions of education  are concerned there are many like invention of aeroplanes-where a person can travel to any part of the world in hours, invention of life saving drugs, computers-without which we cannot do any work, mobiles,artificial parts of human body all these and many more are the fruits we are enjoying in present day are the seeds sown by our ancestors.

  Having said that, on the other hand, we have some disadvantages too we have. like the invention of nuclear bombs, AK-47's, chemical weapons, nuclear weapons etc. all these can destruct the race of the mankind. If the education create problems the it is futile. Education should be used to do good to the mankind but not the destruction.

Education is important, but an well educated man should strive to do something which is useful to the mankind but not to eliminate the human race.
